reference: Judith Chevalier and Glen Ellison, 1995, Risk-Taking by Mutual Funds as a Response to Incentives, NBER Working Paper no. 5234.
Goetzmann, William N. and Nadav Peles, 1997, Cognitive Dissonance and Mutual Fund Investors, Journal of Financial Research, Summer.
